headline: Trane Launches Climate Engineers Scholarships to Empower HVAC Talent in Indonesia
summary: Trane – by Trane Technologies plc (NYSE:TT), a global climate innovator, has announced the launch of the Trane Future Climate Engineers Scholarship program in Indonesia. In partnership with Politeknik Negeri Bandung (POLBAN) and local non-governmental organization Yayasan Generasi Cerdas Iklim (GCI), the program will provide comprehensive support to outstanding students in POLBAN's Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Engineering department. headline: How Trane Technologies' Rebecca Verdon Inspires Innovation and Community Through Sustainable Packaging
summary: Rebecca brings sustainability, creativity and community into everything she does as a Packaging Engineer at Trane Technologies. NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / November 14, 2025 / Packaging Engineer, Rebecca Verdon, is making a difference at work ...
